item.title: quok
item.description: category: hall of fame from: russia/czechia years active: 2013 - 2019 (as quok), 2018 - present (as куок) stream/buy: soundcloud, bandcamp a picture of rapper/producer quok. (image source) musically, quok aligns perfectly with my sensibilities. off-kilter beats, frequent glitches and flairs of sound design, and nuanced song structures are all elements of his songs that i enjoy. his production usually isn’t perfect, and oftentimes his english lyrics can be rather odd.
